messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Suit sensors full (also do we have anybody setting up power?)

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: I see red APC's everywhere, we got anywhere working on power?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Collision Alert

A neighbouring station is throwing rocks at you. (Perhaps they've grown tired of your messages.)

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Golem, you fucking faggot, how dare you do that to poor Ian. Ian did nothing wrong to you :^(

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.
